reviews.text: Very hospitable environ with clean and fully equipped rooms, great breakfast. An insight into traditional indian culture of hospitality. Hotel manager Mr. Ajay and All the staff are excellent hosts who stretch the extra mile to make your stay memorable wanting you to come back again and again. I spent like three months and it was one of my best trip in my life and I felt like I am at home all that time
reviews.title: Just Amazing hotel

reviews.text: Ahmed Ahmed From Iraq
reviews.title: Paradise

reviews.text: As i have said above about the hotel in one word but the hotel is very nice and cosy as i felt like i was home even though i was miles away from my home. The facilities they have at the hotel is above my expectation and the condition of the hotel is just like the 5 star hotel. I am glad my stay was a pleasant and the credit goes to the Hotel staff especially under the management of Mr. Ajay. The buffet i had for the 3 months was very nice as tasty as everyday i got to try the variety of indian taste. The chef has done a wonderful job. The staff at the cafe are very nice and friendly and they are always ready to provide services. In overall i didn't expect i would feel like home away from home while i was in New Delhi. Thanks to all the staff and the management of the hotel for making my stay the most memorable. I would personally recommend to all those who wish to visit New Delhi to have an unique experience of staying at the Red Fox Hotel, East Delhi.
reviews.title: My stay at REFFOX Hotel

reviews.text: Thank you.
reviews.title: Decent place to rest

reviews.text: I work as a senior manager at SIEMENS handling operations worldwide for the data centers. It is always my endeavor to encourage the best that there is in India to do work with me therefore I humbly submit to you Sir, that Mr. Imran Ali at Redfox, East Delhi is shown potential to rise to the topmost position the the field of hospitality and should he be encourage to stay on with you as his loyalty permits he will be the most valuable asset to the organization.
reviews.title: Poor Experience

reviews.text: We were participating in Delhi Wood - a wood expo and had to choose a hotel for me and my colleagues for 4 days. We chose Red Fox, as my earlier experience in the month of December had been pretty good, and my choice was vindicated, as my colleagues loved it as it was a true VFM option in Delhi.
reviews.title: Value For Money

reviews.text: We had signed up for a corporate offer incl Break fast and Dinner. It was sumptuous to say the least, as we had ample choice of Indian and overseas options. The rooms were spic and span. They are utilitarian - in the sense - not for the one who loves space and comfort in the form of add ons. Truly functional, with only beds and chair and little room to manuovre. But we had paid only for that much!!
reviews.title: awesome-dowsome stay!!!!!

reviews.text: If you are a VFM [Value For Money] Business traveller who will be checking in late night and leaving for the market post breakfast every day during your stay in Delhi - Red fox might be the right choice for you!
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.text: PS: I saw a lot of foreigners and am given to understand that there are a lot of repeat customers in that category...!
reviews.title: The hotel which is 'just right' for me, a business traveler aged 66.

reviews.text: very neat and clen environment and perfect helping staff specially mr. Aakash Bhatia..
reviews.title: Best Value in Delhi for European and Australians.

reviews.text: This hotel is possibly good location for the people who has business in Noida.
reviews.title: very cold

reviews.text: The food was good at the restaurant. Some receptionist work very hard.
reviews.title: Budget hotel

reviews.text: However, this hotel is too cold during winter. Even the restaurant and reception area were so cold. I have to wear same clothes as outside. They should have heater in each room.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable stay

reviews.text: Most of cleaning quality was fine, but some small area like blinds etc were very dusty. I need to pull the blind and my hand became black!!!! They should have better cleaning.
reviews.title: Budget stay - new hotel
Warning: Ammonia Leak in Room
reviews.text: For what it is, this hotel is very expensive.

Hotel rooms are very modern but the location of the hotel far from transport connectivity like as metro,Bus etc, Its cheap hotel in Delhi near Noida (Business hub of India)...Buffet breakfast is very very nice you can find dishes from every part of the India..
reviews.title: Best & Value for the money

reviews.text: The hotel is very well maintained and is value for money. The service received was of a class of its own. Vikas DFOM was great with his service and assistance required during my stay. He is an asset to the organisation. Keep up the good work!!!
reviews.title: It was a great experience

reviews.text: Raj (housekeeping) you were fantastic and made our stay a pleasant one. Staff in the dining room were very nice and pleasant. The hotel is reasonably comfortable and clean. Not a great variety to choose from on the menue but nevertherless a pleasant stay and great value.
reviews.title: A comfortable stay with excellent housekeeping staff

reviews.text: You dont have much choices in Noida, this hotel gives you a good choice if you are looking for a good property to stay near Noida. A very neat and clean hotel with self service kind of thing. The value for money is there as you need to bargain if you are looking for discount. It has a cafe, which serves you decent food.
reviews.title: Good value for money spent

reviews.text: Good. comfortable, friendly staff, value for money, food was also good, only issue is the distance from the metro station. walkable distance one will find shops. facility to purchase some stuff at the hotel is also there. i like the ambience, with the jokes on the dining table etc. its a nice place. will surely stay here on my next trip.
reviews.title: value for money, clean and friendly staff
